import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Url } from '../models/url.model'; import { Roles } from '../models/roles' import { RedirectService } from '../services/redirect.service'; import { MyRoleService } from '../services/role.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-urls-table', templateUrl: './urls-table.component.html', styleUrls:['./urls-table.component.css'], }) export class UrlsTableComponent { @Input() urls: Url[] = []; public Roles = Roles; constructor(private redirectService: RedirectService, public roleService: MyRoleService) { } generateRedirect(slug: string) { return this.redirectService.generateRedirectUrl(slug); } }
# Id UserId UserName BaseUrl ShortenedUrl Description CreatedAt ModifiedAt Actions
{{ i + 1}} {{ url.id }} {{ url.userId }} {{ url.userName }} {{ url.baseUrl }} {{ generateRedirect(url.slug) }} {{ url.description }}
{{ url.createdAt | date : "dd/MM/yyyy"}}
{{ url.createdAt | date : "HH:mm:ss"}}
{{ url.modifiedAt | date : "dd/MM/yyyy"}}
{{ url.modifiedAt | date : "HH:mm:ss"}}
